fields.name: value
fields.desc: The value to track over time.

fields.name: shouldChangeUndoStack
fields.desc: Called when checking whether a value change should be pushed onto the undo stack.

fields.name: undoStackModifier
fields.desc: Called right before a new entry is pushed to the undo stack.

fields.name: onTriggered
fields.desc: Called when an undo or redo causes a state change.

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: The [FocusNode] that will be used to listen for focus to set the initial undo state for the element.

nodes.name: Using UndoHistory in TextField
desc: In this example, the undo/redo functionality of the TextField is controlled via an external button. The undoController parameter can be passed an UndoHistoryController object to control and influence the input text content.
